short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It replaces your current Chrome New Tab window with a feature packed New Tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a custom chrome tab extension and new tab searches are powered by Yahoo! 

By clicking "add to chrome", I accept and agree to installing the Elegant Tab extension and setting chrome new tab search provider to Yahoo! as described by the service in the Terms of Use https://www.ElegantTab.com/terms.html and Privacy Policy https://www.ElegantTab.com/policy.html

This tool contains links to external websites that are not provided or maintained by or in any way affiliated with our company or this product. Please note that our company or this tool does not guarantee the accuracy, relevance, timeliness, or completeness of any information on these external websites. For more information visit our Terms of Use page listed below.

Uninstall Instructions: https://www.ElegantTab.com/uninstall.html
EULA/Terms of Use - https://www.ElegantTab.com/terms.html
Privacy Policy - https://www.ElegantTab.com/policy.html
Contact Us: http://www.ElegantTab.com/terms.html#terms-contact
About Us: https://www.ElegantTab.com/about.html

To remove our extension from Google Chrome:
 
1) Click on the three horizontal lines icon in the upper right-hand corner of your Chrome browser.
2) Go to "Settings".
3) In the menu that appears click on "Extensions".
4) From the list of installed Extensions, find the name of the toolbar extension you wish to uninstall.
5) Click on the trash can icon to the right of "Enable" (for the toolbar extension you wish to uninstall).
6) Close your browser completely and reopen it. Our toolbar extension should be removed from your Chrome browser.
